definition: to keep your attention so strongly that you feel unable to move or look away
the female ruler of an independent state
move or jump suddenly or rapidly upward or forward
deny (a person or place) the possession or use of something
a person who is studying at a school or college
an injury to living tissue caused by a cut
discussion aimed at reaching an agreement
the action of raising someone to a higher position or rank or the fact of being so raised.
